  • All Classes
 

Package in.co.rays.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ORSView
    ORSView interface defines constants for all the view (JSP) pages and their corresponding controller (Servlet) paths used in the application.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseCtl
    Abstract base controller providing common constants, utility methods, and request handling logic for all controllers.
    ChangePasswordCtl
    Controller to handle change password operations.
    CollegeCtl
    CollegeCtl handles add, update and display operations for College entities.
    CollegeListCtl
    Controller for handling College List operations such as searching, pagination, and deletion of records.
    CourseCtl
    CourseCtl Controller.
    CourseListCtl
    Controller to handle Course list operations such as search, delete, and navigation.
    ErrorCtl
    Error Controller to handle system errors and forward to the error view.
    FacultyCtl
    FacultyCtl is a controller to handle add/update operations on Faculty data.
    FacultyListCtl
    FacultyListCtl servlet handles the operations for displaying, searching, paginating, and deleting faculty records in the application.
    ForgetPasswordCtl
    Servlet implementation class ForgetPasswordCtl
    FrontController
    FrontController is a filter that manages user session and request authorization for secured URLs.
    GetMarksheetCtl
    Controller to get a student's marksheet by roll number.
    LoginCtl
    Login functionality Controller.
    MarksheetCtl
    MarksheetCtl servlet class to handle create/update/view operations on marksheet.
    MarksheetListCtl
    MarksheetListCtl servlet class to handle listing, searching, and deleting marksheet records.
    MarksheetMeritListCtl
    MarksheetMeritListCtl servlet handles the display of top merit list of marksheets.
    MyProfileCtl
    Controller to handle My Profile functionality including viewing and updating user profile data.
    RoleCtl
    RoleCtl Controller to handle add/update role operations.
    RoleListCtl
    Servlet implementation class RoleListCtl
    StudentCtl
    StudentCtl servlet handles adding, updating, and preloading student records.
    StudentListCtl
    StudentListCtl servlet handles listing, searching, pagination, deletion, and navigation for student records.
    SubjectCtl
    SubjectCtl servlet handles add, update, cancel, and reset operations for subjects.
    SubjectListCtl
    SubjectListCtl handles listing, searching, pagination, deletion, and navigation for subjects.
    TimetableCtl
    TimetableCtl handles creation, update, validation, and preload of timetable data.
    TimetableListCtl
    TimetableListCtl handles searching, listing, deleting, and navigating timetable records.
    UserCtl
    UserCtl manages adding, updating, and displaying user details.
    UserListCtl
    UserListCtl manages displaying, searching, pagination, and deletion of users.
    UserRegistrationCtl
    UserRegistrationCtl manages user registration, validation, and signup.
    WelcomeCtl
    WelcomeCtl handles the welcome page requests and forwards to the welcome view.
